webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.utils.yaml module¶

Utilities for parsing YAML page object representations.

Bases: Exception

webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.utils.yaml.parse_yaml_file(path)[source]¶

Parses a YAML file and returns a dictionary representation of it

Parameters:path – Path to the YAML file
Returns:A dictionary representation of the YAML file
webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.utils.yaml.parse_locator_dict(locator_dict)[source]¶

Takes a locator dictionary from a parsed YAML file and returns the locator tuple

Parameters:locator_dict –

Locator dictionary from a parsed YAML file. A valid locator dict must have the following keys:

  • ’by’: name of attribute from selenium.webdriver.common.by.By
  • ’locator’: locator string

Note

The string mapped to the ‘by’ key will be capitalized before checking if it’s a valid attribute of the By class
Returns:Parsed WebDriver locator tuple
